Convert Disease Week to Week Ending Date

mmwrweek_to_date.Rd

When calendar date is unknown, convert disease week to week ending date.

Usage

mmwrweek_to_date(year, week)

Arguments

year

MMWR Year.

week

MMWR Week.

Value

Week ending date (Saturday).

Examples

mmwrweek_to_date(2023, 52)
#> [1] "2023-12-30"
